sentences.en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is costly.
sentences.cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

sentences.en: Buying new furniture may prove too costly.
sentences.cn: 购买新家具可能会花钱太多。

sentences.en: Coastal defence is a costly business.
Having curtains made professionally can be costly.
sentences.cn: 找专业公司制作窗帘会非常昂贵。

sentences.en: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
sentences.cn: 他的优柔寡断长久下去要付出巨大代价。

sentences.en: It can be costly to refinance.
sentences.cn: 再融资有时费用会很高。

sentences.en: It must be very costly to keep up a house like this.
sentences.cn: 维修这么一幢房子一定很昂贵.

sentences.en: It was a costly ( or expensive ) error.
sentences.cn: 那是一次损失很重的错误.
那是一次代价很高的胜利.

sentences.en: Our former process was too costly.
sentences.cn: 我们上道制造程序成本太高.

sentences.en: Psychometric tests can save organizations from grim and costly mistakes.
sentences.cn: 心理测试能够使组织机构避免犯下损失惨重的大错。

sentences.en: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.cn: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

sentences.en: Such plants could grow in the world's worst soils without costly help.
sentences.cn: 这类植物用不着投资就能在世界上最差的土壤里生长.

sentences.en: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
sentences.cn: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

sentences.en: They bribed him with costly presents.
sentences.cn: 他们用贵重的礼物贿赂他.

sentences.en: This dictionary is very useful, only it is a bit costly.
sentences.cn: 这本词典很有用, 左不过贵了些.

words.tran_cn: 不花钱的；无须付出代价的
花费；使付出；使花许多钱

trans.tran_cn: 昂贵的，造成严重损失的
trans.tran_en: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money
